title: Ep. 354 - Court Sanctioned Child Abuse
description:
A court ruled in favor of a mother who wants to force her son to be a girl. We'll take a look at this horrific case and talk about its implications. I will try not to scream too much. Also, two college students have been charged with the crime of "ridicule" for using a racial slur. Yes, really. Date: 10-22-2019
